title: In-chat ping bug
body:
(apologies, I do not have screenshots) 

Many of the pings & chats, specifically pinging a tower or targeting a champ, it will show blank.
For example I will ping assist at tower,
It will say
"colossalJinx (Soraka) requests aid at the "
Then the next chat will fill that space, so if I pinged that again,
"colossalJinx (Soraka) requests aid at the colossalJinx (Soraka) " or so. 
& whenever I type after this, the chat remains blank, until another player enters a normal chat message. 
The pings appear on-map but the chat is very bugged. 

Apparently one of my friends has the same issue.
It's quite annoying & hard to pay attention to pings due to it.
Anyone else share this issue...?
